result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:32 AM Defendant Mitchell W Ludtke in court.  Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore in court for Mitchell W Ludtke.  Prosecuting attorney Lucas D Arras in court for the State of Wisconsin. B. Bahr - Clerk 
22CF03, 22CF309, 22CM26, 22TR1272, 22TR14, 22TR15, 22TR92, 22TR5029

22CF03, 22CM26, 22TR14, 22TR15, 22TR92 - Status 22TR5029 - INIT

22CF309 - INIT
Atty Larimore- rcvd complaint. waives reading. waives time limits on preliminary hearing.
Court - sets prelim on 1/13/23 at 11:30 AM. All remaining cases to be set a status hearings tagging along.

22TR1272 - Motion to Reopen
Atty Larimore - argues for matter to be reopened.
State - speaks of testimony to be heard or offer of proof. Will defer to Court. Issue is if DE was served the refusal paperwork or not.
Court - will hear testimony.
11:40 AM - Atty Larimore calls Mitchell Ludtke. Witness is sworn in and testifies.
State - cross examines witness.  Atty Larimore - redirect 11:48 AM witness is excused.
11:48 AM - State calls Dept Samantha Caress. Witness is sworn in and testifies. Offers Ex #1, #2, #3. Atty Larimore - no objection. Court rcvs Ex #1, #2, #3
Atty Larimore - cross examines.  State - re direct.  12:00 PM witness is excused.
State - asks court to take judicial notice in 22CM26 and 22CF03. Court - takes Judicial notice.  Atty Larimore - argues for Court to grant motion. State - argues against motion
Court - denies motion to reopen
Atty Larimore - asks for status
